DOC.brief_summary: Vitamin D major play bone calcium metabolism . Vitamin D deficiency ( 20 ng/ml ) also link adverse health outcome malignancy , cardiovascular disease , immune functioning , glucose metabolism . Recent data retrospective prospective trial demonstrate contradictive result concern role vitamin D female reproduction IVF outcome . Some study find woman deficient vitamin D low ovarian reserve significantly low clinical pregnancy rate compare patient sufficient level vitamin D. Some study also demonstrate serum 25-OH-D3 level correlate antimullerian hormone ( AMH ) level woman advance reproductive age . It may also role play endocrine dysfunction abnormal folliculogenesis polycystic ovary . The aim prospective cohort study include infertile woman undergo IVF treatment investigate association serum 25-OH- D3 level parametres ovarian reserve ( AMH , antral follicle count , number oocyte collect ) clinical pregnancy miscarriage rate .
